title: "new" used pixel 3. warning notification that the "bootloader is unlocked, data may not be secure"
content: I just bought a used Pixel 3. When I start the device i get a warning notification: "bootloader unlocked and software integrity may not be guaranteed. Any data stored on the device may be available to attackers." Please advise how to secure my phone.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
